DOC.brief_summary: ED patient acute migraine randomize either prochlorperazine Bendaryl OR imitrex . VAS pain monitor , along side effect . Primary outcome measure improvement pain scale group .
DOC.brief_title: Prochlorperazine v Imitrex Acute Migraine Emergency Department
DOC.criteria: Acute migraine headache Pregnant Hypertension Chest pain < 18 Allergy med
